name: Design Prompt #8: Working from Concept Art
name_original: Design Prompt #8: Working from Concept Art
description:
W & Up Arrow key - Jumps

A & Left Arrow key - Moves Left

S & Right Arrow key - Moves Right

R - To Reload Level

Get to the RED ORB POLE!!!

Swift Shade

LINK TO MOOD BOARD:

https://www.tumblr.com/blog/cat392

Mood Board Comments:

So using Jason's mood board was fairly easy and the background was easily imported into the game. I was unsure how to make it a survival game so I started with a timed runner. Working with the colors was very easy, sprites and objects stand out from the background and work great. Jason mentioned something about Bandits and Mages, I did try to incorporate those by using bunny people that have a sword and cape. The main sprite is called skull guy, he is a Grim Reaper and has to traverse the land to get to the giant red orb pole.
